node.title: Stephen Colbert: Biden Got the Pope’s Blessing
node.alt: To Biden’s “God love ya” remark to Pope Francis, Stephen Colbert said: “Yeah, he does. Pretty sure that’s the papal job description on LinkedIn.”
node.description: “The pope telling you you’re a good Catholic is like a bear telling you you’re good at pooping in the woods,” Colbert said of President Biden, who visited the Vatican over the weekend.
node.content: ["Welcome to Best of Late Night, a rundown of the previous night\u2019s highlights that lets you sleep \u2014 and lets us get paid to watch comedy. Here are the 50 best movies on Netflix right now.", "President Biden over the weekend visited the Vatican, where he gave Pope Francis a coin and parted ways by saying, \u201cGod love ya.\u201d", "\u201cYeah, he does,\u201d Stephen Colbert joked on Monday\u2019s \u201cLate Show.\u201d \u201cPretty sure that\u2019s the papal job description on LinkedIn: \u2018God love ya. Must be good with crowds. Some Latin required. Five to 10 years\u2019 waving experience.\u2019\u201d", "Jimmy Kimmel didn\u2019t ask for videos of adults tricking their kids into believing they ate all their Halloween treats for his annual challenge this year, but some parents just couldn\u2019t resist.", "Tom Hanks will talk about his latest film, \u201cFinch,\u201d on Tuesday\u2019s \u201cJimmy Kimmel Live.\u201d", "In her debut essay collection, \u201cMy Body,\u201d the model and influencer Emily Ratajkowski writes about cashing in on her image for a living."]
